contract_title: 2025 AI Consulting Services Agreement - Project Nexus

sections.details: Supplier to provide advanced AI model consultation services including architecture design, implementation guidance, and performance optimization for Project Nexus AI initiatives.
Invoices will be submitted monthly. Time-and-materials at $400 per hour with an NTE of $15,000 for Q4. Overage requires written change order. Payment terms are Net 30.
This agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California. All work performed under this agreement is considered confidential and the intellectual property of Global Innovations Corp.
